name: Tower of Tension
description:
Welcome to the Tower of Tension!

You've traveled far to be here, and at long last, the Legendary Hammer of Sixela is almost within your grasp. But first, you must climb the tower, face terrible spikey bois, ferocious spherical cows, and the mysterious but very clean roambos!

With your trusty baseball bat, and the promise of rocket launchers, hook shooters, and jetpacks ahead of you, you know that where most have failed, YOU will succeed!

Features physics based combat! Like a violent game of golf, launch your enemies into each other, out windows, and into holes! In turn, avoid having that happen to you!

Instructions
  • Use arrow keys to move around, or swipe if you are on mobile!
  • Press . to wait for a turn! On mobile, drawing a closed shape (like a circle, or a cool triangle) will do the same.
  • Press > or < to descend or ascend stairs! OR: Use the ascend and descend buttons that will appear as a SPECIAL ACTION when possible!
  • Navigate through the side-menu to manage your inventory!
